betterquesting:10.desc:8:
[quest]Mega Array[/quest]

§6Machine Type: §aProcessing Array§r | §aGenerator Array§r

The Mega Array is a bigger and better version of the Processing Array. Unlike the PA, the Mega Array can do more than §c64§r of a singleblock allowing for more parallels and even more fun with automation. 

[note]To add a machine(s) to the MegaArray, put the singleblocks in an input bus and §aScrewdriver§r the controller.[/note]

To get the singleblocks back, screwdriver the controller once more and it will output the machines to the Output Bus. 

Max Parallelism of the MegaArray is:

§c320§r
§c1,280§r
§c5,120§r
§c20,480§r
§c5,242,880§r
§c2,147,483,647§r 

Base Parallelism is §c64§r.

[note]Supports almost all processing single block machines in GTNH. Including Singleblock generators and Solar Panels.[/note]

§cWill overclock recipes to energy level of energy hatch, but can't process recipes with energy level higher than that of the machines in the controller. 

§6Energy Hatch Tier:§r Tier of Glass
§6Dynamo Hatch Tier:§r Tier of Machine Casing
§6Tier of Machines:§r Restricted by Frames

§aUV Glass unlocks laser hatches§r

UMV Casings will unlock all dynamo hatches and unlock global wireless mode.

§lAddon Structures ---§r

Use up to §c§o5§r Hologram Projectors to see the addon structural towers.

§aThe tier of machines is not limited when there's no addon structures. Level of parallelism casing in addon structures limits the Parallelism.§r 

Energy consumption will decrease §c10%§r for each coil upgrade.
Processing speed will increase §c50%§r for each parallelism upgrade. 
Each machine provides §c2§r ^ (tier of parallelism block). Casings 3/4 provide §c512§r/§c1,024§r parallelism.§r 

The upgrades in energy/consumption/processing speed/parallelism will also take effect in enegy generation. 

§9§nStructural Guidelines:

§d§oFor each TOWER (maximum of 4)§r

Parallelism Casing: §c134§r
Glass: §c530§r
Frame: §c64§r
Coil: §c42§r
Stainless Steel Casing: §c86§r
Assembly Line Casing: §c64§r
